title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
content: First, let me mention that this is supposed to be aÂ  post for the gambling board, but since Waje games is only serving Nigerians, and maybe some parts of Africa only, I decided our local community will be the best appropriate place to post this, this my personal review of this new gaming/gambling app..Waje games is a new and very popular gaming/gambling app any one can download from Google play store or iphone app store, they have their Google ads running and this ads is shown or displayed on almost every app on your phone that supports display of Google ads, they also have ads running on Facebook and some other social media platforms, so if you have not come across Waje games ad on the internet, then it probably means you are not an aggressive user of the internet like myself ..I cam across Waje games through their ad, and after seeing same ads for several weeks, I decided to download and try the game, interestingly , the app contained various type of very interesting games like whot-whot (which is my personal favorite and I am also very good at this game) Roulette and several others , I quickly signed up and if I still remember , I was given a 50 naira sign up bonus, I used the 50 naira to play whot-whot, I won several of the games and in just 3 or four games , 50 naira became 500 naira and more, but i went all in one round and it turned bad, I was beaten by my opponent and I lost all the money ..Finding the game very interesting by now, I had to deposit 3000 naira to still continue trying the game, after my deposit was successfully recorded in the app., I discovered that the system/game set up completely changed, now the minimum I can bet on each round of the game was 100 naira, on like before when I can bet any amount, even 5 naira if I want,Â  and also , previously , they paired me with just one other player which made winning the whot-whot game pretty easy for me, now that they had my real money, the system now paired me with extra three players which drastically reduced my winning chances by more than 99 percent, and the worst part is, those extra 3 players they paired me with, 2 are always bots, a computer program, while only 1 will be a real person/player.. Â The long story short is that, I played and played, this computer program was always winning and winning, until my entire 3000 naira was gone in just about 1 to 2 hours, they don't allow you to choose the number of players you want to be paired with, they just impose a four man game on you and make sure you never win until your whole balance is drained..After my bankroll became empty, I personally knew the entire game was super rigged and refused to deposit money anymore, but rather, I start playing the game in free mode, after 3 rounds of playing in free mode, they locked me out and asked me to deposit money if I want to continue playing ðŸŽ´ðŸŽ´ðŸŽ´.. Conclusion is - Waje game is a complete rigged game, I think it is not out of place to say that this gaming app was developed by scammers to use as a medium to defraud Nigerian gamblers, avoid this gaming app if you gave never tried it before and want to or have plans to one day, try them out ..If you have actually tried this gaming app, what is your experience like?, Please share .
